alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 2:33PM CDT until May 17 at 7:51PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River at Hwy 72 near Runge affecting Karnes and Goliad Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 34.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM CDT Sunday was 35.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday morning and continue falling to 20.5 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 35.9 feet on 04/08/2023. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 34.5 Sun 2 pm CDT 30.7 28.6 26.4 &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 245 AM CDT.
